name: claude-gradle-plugin
description: Comprehensive Claude plugin for Gradle development with skills for project analysis, build optimization, dependency management, performance tuning, and migration guidance. Supports Gradle 8+ and 9+ with migration paths from Gradle 6 and 7.

commands.description: Custom Gradle commands for quick access to build tasks, analysis, and troubleshooting

skills.description: Gradle development skills that Claude invokes autonomously for project analysis, optimization, and problem-solving

typescript.name: gradle-build-agent
typescript.description: Agent for executing and managing complex Gradle builds with automated error detection

typescript.name: gradle-doctor-agent
typescript.description: Build health analysis agent with gradle-doctor integration for automated diagnostics, GC tuning, repository performance, and configuration validation

typescript.name: gradle-migration-agent
typescript.description: Agent for guiding Gradle version migrations from 6/7 to 8/9 with automated compatibility checks

typescript.name: gradle-dependency-agent
typescript.description: Advanced dependency analysis and conflict resolution agent

hooks.description: Lifecycle hooks for build validation, automatic error detection, and optimization suggestions
